projects.title: Genius Shooter
projects.description: A roguelike mobile game with over 500,000+ global MAU, made by SAGI GAMES. I was a backend engineer in the team.

paragraphs: I'm Muen Yu, currently based in Brisbane and seeking a full-stack software engineer position. I previously worked at the startup game company [SAGI GAMES](https://sagigames.cn) as a backend engineer, where I was responsible for game server and internal system development, as well as cloud infrastructure. If youâ€™re interested in the tools/software I use or my working style, please check out my [uses page](/uses).
In my spare time I like to write [blog posts](https://mashiro.best/archives/), develop & deploy automation in my homelab, watch Esport match and play video games.
